title: Formerly Known As The Justice League
description:
Formerly Known As The Justice League follows Maxwell Lord as a puts together a superhero team "accessible to the common man". The 'Super Buddies' were former members of Justice League International; Blue Beetle, Booster Gold, Fire, The Elongated Man and his wife Sue, Captain Atom. and Mary Marvel.  Although a very tongue-in-cheek book it is fully canon and can be placed shortly after Oliver Queen is brought back to life (Green Arrow  v3).

The team was created by writers Keith Giffen and J. M. DeMatteis, and artists Kevin Maguire and Joe Rubinstein.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
